meanings.definition: A game in which one player gives a word or line of verse to be matched in rhyme by other players.
meanings.sent1: During the party, we played a fun game of crambo where we had to rhyme words.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed playing crambo and coming up with rhyming words.
meanings.sent3: In crambo, I rhymed 'cat' with 'hat' and everyone laughed.
meanings.sent4: The crambo game turned into a battle of wits as players tried to out-rhyme each other.
meanings.sent5: The rules of crambo made it easy for everyone to participate and have fun.

meanings.definition: A rhyming word or line of verse used in the game of crambo.
meanings.sent1: She came up with a clever crambo that stumped the other players.
meanings.sent2: The winning crambo was 'moon' rhymed with 'spoon' in the game.
meanings.sent3: His silly crambo about a purple cow made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The perfect crambo can make or break your chances of winning the game.
meanings.sent5: The final round of crambo had everyone on the edge of their seats.
